comment: In this solution there are a lot of mistakes; for example $Bigl(\frac{1}{n}\Bigr)^{\!1/n}\le \frac{1}{n}$ is false, then in the next line the direction of the inequality is wrong. The inequalities with $a$ cannot be valid for any $a$. Using the quantiles looks as a very interesting idea but the inequalites $f\Bigl(q_{1-1/n}\Bigr)\le \mathbb{E}[f(X)]\le f\Bigl(q_{1/n}\Bigr).$ should be definitely proven, but even then this does not lead to to complete solution.
